participant_1.name: Jacob
participant_1.personality: Curious and analytical, always seeking to understand the world around him.
participant_1.background: A software engineer with a passion for technology and gaming. Grew up in a small town but moved to the city for work.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and friendly, loves to meet new people and share ideas.
participant_2.background: An aspiring artist who enjoys exploring different mediums. Raised in a culturally rich environment, which influenced her artistic style.
